title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_Chassis.v0_1_0

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Backplanes.description: This is a link to a collection of Backplanes within this Chassis.
Backplanes.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Backplane schema.

Baseboards.description: This is a link to a collection of Baseboards within this Chassis.
Baseboards.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Baseboard schema.

EthernetSwitches.description: This is a link to a collection of EthernetSwitches hosted on the Backplanes of this Chassis.
EthernetSwitches.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the EthernetSwitch schema.

PCIeSwitches.description: This is a link to a collection of PCIeSwitches hosted on the Backplanes of this Chassis.
PCIeSwitches.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the PCIeSwitch schema.

Links.description: Base type for an Oem object.
Links.longDescription: This object represents the base type for an Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.
